short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic tool to visualise how your web page will look within an iOS safari frame. Note this does not actually emulate safari.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tool to preview how your web page will appear within an iOS Safari frame. Note: this does not emulate Safari functionality.

- Displays your content within a frame set to the deviceâ€™s dimensions.
- Adds an overlay of the Safari browser frame around your content.
- Allows you to take screenshots of the device view.
